item.title: [PI] help! pk points!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

this is my applydead method and whenever a player dies in the wild from a monster they get 5 pk points? any idea??

[code]public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;
if (c.playerRights >= 2) {
return;
}

    if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
		//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
		c.killerId = findKiller();
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if(o != null) {
			if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
			}
			if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
                o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!");
	if(c.inWild()) {
                                    o.magePoints += 5;
                                    o.sendMessage("You have received 5 PkPoints!!");
                            }[/code]

Read full topic
